title: on me by section 111B(3) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section 

111B(3)) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited tax consolidation act 1997 (section 111b(3)) order 2024

title: on me by section 111B(3) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997),
heading: In this Order, “Act of 1997” means the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 1997” means the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 

(No. 39 of 1997).
text_norm: 2 order act 1997 mean tax consolidation act 1997 (no 39 1997)

title: on me by section 111B(3) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997),
heading: 3. The document entitled OECD (2024), Tax Challenges Arising from the
text_raw:
3. The document entitled OECD (2024), Tax Challenges Arising from the 
Digitalisation of the Economy – Administrative Guidance on the Global AntiBase Erosion Model Rules (Pillar Two), June 2024, OECD/G20 Inclusive 
Framework on BEPS, OECD, Paris, published by the OECD on 17 June 2024, 
is designated as being comprised in the OECD Pillar Two guidance (within the 
meaning of section 111B of the Act of 1997) for the purposes of Part 4A of the 
Act of 1997. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 October, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [551] 3
